name: mat-block
effect: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user
protects itself and its allies from damaging moves.
This does not stop status moves.

protects itself and its allies from damaging moves.
